General.Name: LS telcom AG
General.Description: LS telcom AG provides software, IT system, hardware, planning, and consultancy services for optimal spectrum use customers worldwide. The company offers its products in the areas of spectrum policy, licensing, and management; spectrum monitoring; radio communications and private networks; network planning tools; and airborne measurements. It serves customers in the spectrum regulation, public safety, public transportation, railways, airports, ports and hubs, industries, oil and gas utilities, defense and security, smart healthcare, mobile network operators, and broadcast industries. LS telcom AG was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Lichtenau, Germany.
